name.baseName: 酸洗板卷|热轧板卷|酸洗法|所有规模

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisNeutralization + chemical coagulation method + precipitation separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisNeutralization + chemical coagulation method + precipitation separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该过程包括使用适用于所有尺寸的酸洗方法处理酸洗板卷和热轧板卷产品。该过程与末端污染管理技术整合在一起，这对于处理废水和特定污染物（如化学需氧量、石油相关废物、氨氮、有机结合氮、总磷和汞）至关重要。治理技术采用中和、化学混凝法和沉淀分离，对不同污染物的处理效率各不相同。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码3130文件，在完整版文件中第4111页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution MercuryisNeutralization + chemical coagulation method + precipitation separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标汞的末端治理技术是中和法+化学混凝法+沉淀分离，其效率为0，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水治理设备年正常运行小时数（小时）/生产系统年运行小时数（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为汞，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为汞

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisNeutralization + chemical coagulation method + precipitation separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70
污染物指标石油类的末端治理技术是中和法+化学混凝法+沉淀分离，其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水治理设备年正常运行小时数（小时）/生产系统年运行小时数（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为石油类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为石油类

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisNeutralization + chemical coagulation method + precipitation separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management30

污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是中和法+化学混凝法+沉淀分离，其效率为0，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水治理设备年正常运行小时数（小时）/生产系统年运行小时数（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量
